properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 11:53AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected.
Waves 2 to 4 feet. Highest along the east sides of the lake.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve Sunday.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
